statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 7 \\ 13 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ -4 \\ 5 \\ 7 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
